text: Alayaron (English: The Dawn) is one of the first Bodo feature movies. It was released in 13 March 1986 at Ganga Talkies, Kokrajhar. It was directed by Jwngdao Bodosa, based upon the short story Mwdwi arw Gwlwmdwi (Tears and Sweat) by Nilkamal Brahma. The movie stars Amar Narzary and Rohila Brahma. It was also the winner of the National Film Award in 1986. ==Directed by== *Jwngdao Bodosa ==Written by== *Nilkamal Brahma *Heramba Narzary ==Based on== Mwdwi arw Gwlwmdwi *Nilkamal Brahma ==Starring== *Amar Narzary *Rohila Brahma *Tikendrajit Narzary ==Genre== *Drama ==Release date== * 13 March 1986 ==Country== *India ==Language== *Bodo ==Cast== *Amar Narzary as Gwmbwr *Rohila Brahma as Hangna ==Related pages== *Bodo people Category:1986 movies
title: Alayaron (movie)
